website_summaries.verdict: If you want a lightweight model that's easy to maneuver and store, this is a great choice. But if you want more powerful suction, we recommend a different Miele product.
pros: Crevice, FiberTeQ, and upholstery tools are ideal for cleaning low-pile rugs and hard floors
The powerful motor and AirClean filter system reflect Miele's quality
cons: Not ideal for thick carpet or heavy-duty cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vacuum with different attachment
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum for quick clean ups of our downstairs hardwood floors. The pros are that it's easy to get out and use quickly, the cord is nice and long, it has a bag which we prefer for allergies, and the unit itself is very quiet while running. As a negative, we found that the vacuum head that comes with the unit scratched our hardwood floors (Brazilian cherry so they are dark). We ended up purchasing another Miele attachment for hardwood floors only to use with this unit, and it works very well. Also, the head that comes with the unit does not pick up debris along the edge at the baseboards, the new attachment does.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miele H1 earns high marks!
customer_reviews.text: Miele S140 (made in Germany) stick broke after 15 years of faithful service. Devastated, I bought the H1 stick as a cheap replacement not expecting much. To my surprise, the Miele H1 is every bit as competent as its predecessor, and works remarkably well. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: does'nt last
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these vacuums. I like the design and the function of them very much. They are ideally suited for my needs. But they are not durable. All three of them have failed because of the same problem. The latch of the bag door works poorly (i.e., it is hard to close) and all three of them have broken, making the machine useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miele, always better!
customer_reviews.text: It's 100% Miele, made in China. So quiet on low power I can vacuum right up to my cat with out scaring him. High power is still quiet, but a little more suction noise. Keeps the upstairs in great shape. This is the second Miele vacuum in the house. Just can't find a more reliable and pleasant to use vacuum. Check out the Miele web site to learn why you need Miele.
customer_reviews.author: Coat buying husband

customer_reviews.title: Decent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I don't like vacuuming, but I don't mind vacuuming with this thing - small yet powerful to get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Peter Treut

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the lack of customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was originally thrilled with the Miele Swing H1 however after the floor attachment lost a very specific nut to hold the wheel on things turned south. Online requests for support have gone unanswered and the phone numbers provided on the Miele website for locating a dealer for repairs are out of service. Very disappointed in the lack of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Perez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful vacuum. i know it is tempting to pick up the $75 stand vacuum and cross your fingers it lasts longer than a month, but really your are wasting your time and money. this vacuum is something that will last for years and years. so sturdy and the suction is outstanding. my only thought is that if you struggle with heavier vacuums, this isn't for you. it is on the heavier side, but I chalk that up to outstanding product. Miele has a great reputation and this lives up to that
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is absolutely brilliant. Powerful, lightweight and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works well, does not scratch my wooden floors, ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does not scratch my wooden floors, however, it is heavy and will not stand alone. I knew of these problems when I bought it. Compared with other products I would still buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: As always, Miele delivers! Very strong suction on ...
customer_reviews.text: As always, Miele delivers! Very strong suction on my floors, and low volume. My only critical remark is that it is very heavy and you are expected to maneuver it with one hand. It's a bit of work to get into corners with the tools for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Daneka VK Soudak

customer_reviews.title: ' Easy, light weight it swiftly cleans hardwood
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this handy, dandy little vacuum to clean in areas where my Shark Navigator can't navigate, such as under tables, beds, etc. This little gem is my new cleaning 'go-to.' Easy, light weight it swiftly cleans hardwood, tile and wool area rugs in nothing flat. Reviewers are correct in the fact it doesn't stand up on it's own. However a non-slip handle makes propping it against a wall in a closet easy. Using the attachments requires a little effort - remove handle and sweeper head, then attach the tool. Suction is fabulous. With a long-haired cat and OCD on cleanliness Miele has met my need.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent balance and strength
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Miele based on previous good experience with other models. This one is fabulous for wooden floors and area rugs. It is extremely well balanced with very strong, reliable suction. I also suspect that someone closer to the floor, perhaps in a wheelchair, would appreciate how easy this is to use when held from the middle handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for homes with bare floors, rugs, and loose shag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum, is heap filtered, and has minimal moving parts. It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: KenB

customer_reviews.title: Power in a stick vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Great suction. Can be a little difficult to maneuver until one becomes familiar with its operation.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley M. Iwaszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: ... have an upright yellow jazz miele vacuum that I love, that has the sucking power of a jet ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an upright yellow jazz miele vacuum that I love, that has the sucking power of a jet engine. Seriously that vacuum sucked a whole plastic ball into it. This vacuum was a terrible miele disappointment. I wouldn't have minded that it was kind of heavy if the suction had been equivalent to my regular miele, but it was sorely lacking. Not having a hose also didn't work for me. I tried this vacuum on carpet and tile with no success. I could try to vacuum up strings and go over them several times without success. Unfortunately I had to return it and get a regular miele to use in my basement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Valetti

customer_reviews.title: We have a larger Miele and LOVE it and made this purchase for our downstairs hardwoods ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a larger Miele and LOVE it and made this purchase for our downstairs hardwoods when we moved into a new house. Honestly, we have found the suction to be poor. It will definitely not pick up any dog hair. I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Adam B. Fullington

customer_reviews.title: Great but it should come with better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great but it should come with better instructions, watch a youtube to find out more about it if you choose to buy one
customer_reviews.author: Estarovia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat heavy for a small person but still an excellent vacuum for quick jobs.
customer_reviews.author: SBT

customer_reviews.title: Miele just make the best appliances full stop
customer_reviews.text: Miele just make the best appliances full stop. This vacuum is a joy to use. One thing to note is that it can get heavy when vacuuming upholstery. Other than that it's a powerful, smooth and reliable vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Christina More

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good upright. This is a basic modell the cheapest. So its good for small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: attila1973

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: Powerful suction for a stick vac. All attachments from my Miele canister also work on this model, and it's very handy for quick pickups on the wood follow.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: made in china
customer_reviews.text: the product description states that it is "made in germany", when it is actually made in china. wish i would have known that before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. Best one yet , this is my 4th Miele
customer_reviews.author: ss89

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3 months. I'm totally happy. It works great and I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: ned

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum but the bags get expensive.
customer_reviews.text: A decent vacuum for the money, but the bags get very expensive. I wished I would've bought a bagless but have not found a decent one to buy. Dyson is very proud of their product but I am not. And the shark is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tsali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my vacuum cleaner. I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Les Roque

customer_reviews.title: Not really great on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Well, this vac really picks up, but it's not really great on carpet. It's suction is very good, but it could use some improvements in other areas.... JB
customer_reviews.author: JB-NV

customer_reviews.title: the cord is awkward and does not easy wrap around the side of the vacuum for storage
customer_reviews.text: The combo floor brush broke in less than one year after purchase. The vacuum, although Miele, feels cheap/ordinary and did not live up to my expectations for it. Also, the cord is awkward and does not easy wrap around the side of the vacuum for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Just received it today, bought it for my parents ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today, bought it for my parents. It is OK for the price and performance so far, but Amazon should remove "Made in Germany" advertisement on this page, since this particular Miele is NOT German made. It is made in China. More expensive models are made in Germany. I own a number of products from Miele and have never seen a Chinese made one. Otherwise it works OK. Time will tell how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Max

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a good job, but it's a bit heavier than I expected. I wish it came with a flexible hose for dusting. Overall, a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: 'Cece' Welch

customer_reviews.title: It performs well though otherwise with excellent cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit too heavy for the kind of quick use I was looking for. It performs well though otherwise with excellent cleaning power.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Melby

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is too heavy.It's quite difficult to push in different directions and very difficult to lift, even slightly, in order to re-direct it. I am quite capable but find this model is too clunky. It defeats the idea of having a small vacuum "broom" for quick clean ups. I wanted to buy a stronger attachment for carpeting, but have decided instead to look at other products. It's unfortunate as with the HEPA filter which costs an extra $49+/-, this product is close to $250.00.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B. Levenkron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very very happy with my vacuum. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: Foot part fell off after second use and broke into pieces. Will try to get it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Its needs a support and wall is not a good option. It will chip the paint
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Does not stand on its own. Its needs a support and wall is not a good option. It will chip the paint. Very heavy for a stick vacuum No rotating brush (I wanted to use this on the carpeted stairs. Its a back breaker) Pros: Its bagged Suction is great super long cord
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: So so design
customer_reviews.text: No the best example of Miele engineering. Poor suction, the assembly that touches the floor does not have a good design and harbors dirt and subsequent smells. The Miele big vacuums are world-class, but not this unit.
customer_reviews.author: ALY

customer_reviews.title: the Miele swing h1 is a heavy vacumn. strong ...
customer_reviews.text: the Miele swing h1 is a heavy vacumn.strong suction .would give it 5 stars if it was lighter and less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: nancy yeeting

customer_reviews.title: They aren’t what they used to be. This one ...
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t what they used to be. This one is noisier than necessary and doesn’t seem to have the power for all the noise. I don’t use it anymore because I get the same quality clean from a cordless Bissell at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: This is the first appliance that I've fallen in love with.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant whisper. This is the first appliance that I've fallen in love with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well but heavier than I imagined for a quick-clean/vacuum purpose
customer_reviews.author: Longchamp

customer_reviews.title: do not like this vac
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is too heavy, poor instructions, does not pick up dirt well. Not happy with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned for full refund. Too hard to manipulate. I have mixture of hardwoods and floor rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ventimiglia

customer_reviews.title: Love Miele. Have had one of their canister vacs ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Miele. Have had one of their canister vacs for 8 years and it's been the best purchase. Needed a second one for our basement which has hard floors as well as carpet and this works SO much better than less expensive stick vacs. It is indeed heavy but has powerful suction and the pivoting head I've gotten accustomed to having. Transitions nicely from carpet to hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum! We have wood floors and dust bunnies ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! We have wood floors and dust bunnies tend to gather in corners and it's fun to see them get sucked up. The floor head snaps off easily and becomes a powerful portable tool. My one complaint is that you cannot stand the unit up. I wish it came with a tripod similar to a golf club bag so you wouldn't have to lay it on the floor or lean it against a wall. We'll be shopping for attachments soon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lutterman

customer_reviews.title: This is great for a quick clean-up
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a quick clean-up! Very powerful. Great for tile and wood floors. A little hard to Push on carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: JDHelle

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum scratches stairs
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, easy to put together also has a very long cord which is super helpful. I have another Miele upright for our carpet in bedrooms and love it! This one I like but you have to be careful when using. Like others have said if you use it on hardwood stairs it scratches them for some reason so just be aware. Also has really great suction!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for quick cleaning up especially in the kitchen. Will order one of the more powerful vacuums from Miele for deeper cleaning. This is my 3rd Miele and will get the more powerful Miele when I have more money.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: This is the best floor vacum I have every purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor vacum I have every purchased. The suction is phenomenal and gets everything off my walnut wood floors without a single scratch!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Miriam R.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works great for me! I read all the reviews and was hesitant at first. Now after using it for a while I really like it. I don't have to wait for it to recharge. It cleans my wood flooring and rugs quite well. I use it on my steps and downstairs only.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: better than regular stic vacs
customer_reviews.text: A lot heavier than other stick vacs and stiff for tight turns but vacumns really well, better than regular stic vacs. I was able to find 3m vac bags for lesser price on Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Murillo

customer_reviews.title: and works excellent. The Miele swing H1 is built as well ...
customer_reviews.text: We have the Miele twist for carpets,and works excellent. The Miele swing H1 is built as well as the bigger model . We just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shellenbarger

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum I have ever owned. It might have looked old design, it works 100%. I give it 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: bbigg11

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this is such a heavy vacuum cleaner. You need a good work out in order to maneuver it.
customer_reviews.author: I.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good suction. Not a bagless unit. Bags a little expensive. Like the adjustable handle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I find it easy to vaccum around ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I find it easy to vaccum around the house, not too heavy, moves around easily. powerful enough for dog hair and everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Cheap parts, poorly made. Fell apart in the first few months. They claim a year warranty but don't follow through- the small clip that broke off isn't covered by the warranty and is $80 to replace- don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: whish it had some sort of extention or something for the fine attachments. Moving the whole unit to get in ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected, whish it had some sort of extention or something for the fine attachments. Moving the whole unit to get in nooks and crannies takes a lot of effort.
customer_reviews.author: moses

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Have Purchased If I Had Been In A Store
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it is a Miele and I generally love their products. It is too heavy and I WOULD NOT recommend. I wouldn't have bought if I had been in a store and realized how heavy it is. However, the fact that it does have the HEPA filtration makes it a desirable product for those who don't care if it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Webber

customer_reviews.title: works great it replaces a old one that had seen better ...
customer_reviews.text: works great it replaces a old one that had seen better days. price was great
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum quality is excellent. The problem I have is it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum quality is excellent. The problem I have is it does not stand up and you can't lean it against anything because it just falls over. If they could make that ONE improvement I would have given it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Greg or Crystal

customer_reviews.title: ... product of theirs that I use and do not like at all
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of all things MIELE - this is the first product of theirs that I use and do not like at all. I wonder if there might be a statistic of how many hernias and/or chiropractor visits this vacuum caused. I bought this one because the previous MIELE had to retire - and I don't need a huge vacuum. Less is more and suits me just fine - but this one is a pain to operate. Not smooth at all. Wish they'd still produce the ART vacuum which was close to perfect and very spiffy. What was the designer/engineer think when they concocted this sorry puppy of a vacuum?
customer_reviews.author: AmorFati

customer_reviews.title: Love Miele products but cord wind clip broke and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Miele products but cord wind clip broke and they want me to take to a dealer. Just send me the part and I'll be happier. Who has time to drive around looking for a dealer to replace a small part? Smh
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fine Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Well made machine and performs perfectly. This is a quality product. Bought a cheaper model and took it back. This thing will last decades instead of years.
customer_reviews.author: Agamemnon

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this upright
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this upright. TOO HEAVY for the purpose I purchased for. Will NOT stand alone and no way to hang it it closet. I have issue with a part on brush falling off. Cannot recommend. I have tried to get used to this upright but only leads to frustration. I would like to return but my time has expired. I have older Miele canister and it has been an excellent one. Plan to buy new canister type soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built. It has the capacity to attach a head with a spinning brush but it didn't come with one. It doesn't pick up as much as a cheaper stick vacuum I have but that one has a rotating brush head (which throws stuff back at me to so 6 of one...). It's very quiet like my canister Miele, which is great. I don't get the point of the telescoping neck, it's rather too heavy to use like a dust buster or vacuum the ceiling in my opinion. It does make everyday kitchen sweeping more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, this vacuum is just too heavy to be useful for a quick clean up. You have to lay it down or hang on to it.
customer_reviews.author: sm4life

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed of this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed of this vacuum. I trusted the brand and I thought it was worthy the money, but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: New Miele Swing H1 Quick Step Universal Upright Vacuum, Mango Red
product_meta.description:
From ceramic tiles to flagstone, Miele's swing h1 quickstep universal upright vacuum cleaner is ideal for light, quick cleaning tasks on a wide range of smooth floor surfaces, as well as low-to-medium pile carpeting. Unlike many stick vacuums, the universal upright provides ample pickup power with a 1,000 watt Miele-made vortex motor. The swing h1 s194 comes standard with a FiberTeQ combination floor tool that is designed to care for all smooth flooring and low-pile carpeting. An integrated glide feature ensures a gentle clean on even your most sensitive solid floors. And by pressing a convenient rocker footswitch, you'll transition to carpet and rugs with ease.

BRAND STORY
By Miele
feature_bullets: Sbd285-3 rug & floor combination floor brush
Min/Max speed control. Nominal power consumption -1400 W
Crevice tool & Upholstery brush attached via a tool caddy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars139 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
